objectives: Reach the end of each level by jumping across ice platforms
Collect fish and power-ups along the way
Avoid obstacles like falling icicles and slippery patches
Complete bonus challenges for extra points
Unlock new levels by collecting enough stars
tips: Time your jumps carefully - ice platforms may break after a few seconds
Use power-ups strategically to overcome difficult obstacles
Watch out for wind gusts that can affect your jump trajectory
Some platforms are hidden and only appear when you get close
Collect all fish in a level to unlock special rewards
Practice your timing on easier levels before tackling harder ones
Use the slide move to avoid low obstacles and gain speed
